overview: Analingus takes center stage in these four stories of love and lust as eight women push their bodies to the limit of desire. On the hottest day of the year, Miss Lewis (Val Dodds) has her groceries delivered and finds solace from her loneliness in Lily (Chloe Cherry), the younger delivery girl. Living in her car since breaking up with her ex, Katy (Karma RX) is desperate for a new apartment when she meets Jane (Tana Lea). Jane invites Katy to stay, but on one condition... Katy has to shower first. Isabelle (Alison Rey) and Annie (Kate Kennedy) have been best friends for years, but below the surface, both have wanted more. After a big fight, they confess their feelings for each other and finally take their relationship deeper than ever before. Billie (Aidra Fox), a police detective, has returned home unexpectedly and suspects her wife Sharon (Evelyn Claire) is having an affair. As their argument escalates, so does the tension, leading up to an explosive finale.
title: Lesbian Analingus 14
